alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:05PM CDT until May 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 504 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over eastern Norman, or over northeastern Lake Thunderbird, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Norman, Midwest City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Nicoma Park, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Newalla, Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
